alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:48AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Logan, Scott, Polk and northwestern Yell Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 447 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mulberry to near Poteau. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mena... Booneville... Waldron... Paris... Danville... Dardanelle... Mansfield... Magazine... Subiaco... Hatfield... Scranton... Ratcliff... Blue Mountain... Vandervoort... Beauchamp... Cardiff... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Mountain Fork... Midway in Logan County... Mosley... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
